nodes.text: Emergency repair patches were durasteel disks that could be used applied to damaged machinery to keep it operational until repairs could be made. The patches could be used by droids in the same way that organic beings could use stimpacks. The repair patches cost 25 credits per unit.
The patches were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
